issue.title: [Rust] [Parquet] Implement array reader for list type
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7842](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7842). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently array reader does not support list or map types. The initial PR implementing array reader  https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4218 says that list and map support will come later. Is it known when support for list types might be implemented?

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7842?focusedCommentId=17216021) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8449
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8449>
